element.definition: Detailed description of the type of planned activity; e.g. What lab test, what procedure, what kind of encounter.
element.comments: Tends to be less relevant for activities involving particular products.  Codes should not convey negation - use "prohibited" instead.
element.requirements: Allows matching performed to planned as well as validation against protocols.

binding.description: Detailed description of the type of activity; e.g. What lab test, what procedure, what kind of encounter.
